body:
Hey guys!

So today I decided to make this because I really wanted to help out the community.

-What it is:
If you guys have any questions about VANILLA commands and command blocks, post them here and I will help the best I can.

And the best part, it is free of charge!

So ask away!

title: Redstone and Command Block Help Thread

replies.body: how do i get Prefixes in Vanilla (NO MODS or SERVER)
replies.body_tagged: how do i get Prefixes in Vanilla (NO MODS or SERVER)

replies.body:
Ok, so this is a bit difficult. You need the external program NBT Explorer. With this, (not exactly sure of the steps) you will be able to find a file for your world and add things to specific teams. Sorry if this was a bit unclear, I have never actually done this, but I have seen a tutorial. I recommend this tutorial;
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=aaN_VokszzI

Land a quick note, he is in multi-player but it works in singleplayer too.
